title: Stock futures dip slightly as market attempts to build on Monday's comeback - CNBC
content:
1. Stock futures dip slightly as market attempts to build on Monday's comeback  CNBC
  2. Where Elon Musk's Twitter takeover ranks in the biggest tech acquisitions in history  Fortune
  3. Warren Calls for Tougher Tech Regulation After Musk Twitter Deal  Bloomberg

description: Nasdaq futures were muted after stocks bounced on Monday afternoon and ahead of Big Tech earnings.
